about_the_game:
Gather around a tavern table with up to three friends and play Magical Manifest. Summon new card effects, sabotage your friends, and build the perfect deck for yourself with spellbinding card combinations.




Enjoy classic Crazy Eights game play with a deckbuilder twist!
Match cards by elemental suit or number.
Compete with your wizard friends to empty your hand the fastest.
Win by emptying your hand as quick as possible, but watch as the losing players get rewarded by changing the deck to their favor.



Change the shared deck as you play!
Enchant cards to your advantage using runes from the shop. These runes turn normal cards into special cards that can skip players, burn cards permanently, and impact the game in numerous other magical ways. Buy new types of special cards from the shop. Create synergies between your hand and the deck by collecting relics, which only affect your hand. Make the deck advantageous to you while being a nuisance to your friends.

short_description: Even wizards need to take a break from… Whatever they do. So, they made a card game! Enchant the deck in your favor while sabotaging your friends. Magical Manifest is as mystical as you make it in this rogue-like take on Crazy 8s.
